item.description:
Have you been to WooDaddy Waffles yet? This weekend WooDaddy is showing their support for the upcoming Worcester VegFest by running an all-vegan brunch fundraiser.

Every Sunday WooDaddy cooks up some vegan waffles with all the trimmings. This Sunday, March 20, from 11am-3pm, join VegWorcester for a special all-vegan brunch at Moynihan’s at 867 Main St, Worcester. You’ll be able to get traditional waffles, tofu scramble, and even chocolate waffles from the creative chefs at WooDaddy’s. You know they’re good at making vegan food, because they won the 2011 Vegan Mac & Cheese Cook Off. And to sweeten the deal, these waffle-istas will be donating 10% of the day’s proceeds to VegWorcester to support the VegFest.

Even when they’re not doing their vegan special menu, the waffles are always vegan and the WooDaddy peeps always have a good amount of vegan dishes at their brunches. After trying it this weekend, I’m sure you’ll be coming back
item.name: WooDaddy's All Vegan Brunch Fundraiser for VegWorcester - Waffles!!!!!!
